dict.acceptation: 忙乱；大惊小怪；大惊小怪的人；争吵；

sent.orig: I don't see why you are kicking up such a fuss.
sent.trans: 我不明白你为什么要这样小题大作。

sent.orig: Ruth had arrived back without fuss.
sent.trans: 露丝不声不响地回到家里。

sent.orig: My mother makes a fuss of me every time I come home.
sent.trans: 我每次回家，母亲总对我体贴备至。

sent.orig: Just sleep and sleep and eat andand fuss and sleep again.
sent.trans: 大觉，只是饱食终日，无所用心，吃了睡，睡了吃。

sent.orig: The captain looked astern to see what the fuss was about.
sent.trans: 船长在船尾查看了一下，看看发生了什么事。
